Learn how to play Chess Kingdom Game!
Chess puzzles begin with a grid in which each player possesses 16 chess pieces: one king, one queen, two rooks, two knights, two bishops, and eight pawns. Each of the six piece types moves differently. The objective is to checkmate the opponent's king by placing it under an inescapable threat of capture.
